column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Norma - Thank you for your great review. I regret that you found the Crispy Shrimp Balls too salty. I have spoken with the tapas chef and the kitchen-prep team to trace back the preparation and plating of this dish. I will post an update once I can get additional information. That said
column2: please know that our standing policy at JINYA is this: If it's not great
column3: remake! We hope everything on offer is met with the same appeal as you had for the Salmon Cilantro Sashimi. Thanks again
column4: and we hope to serve you in the near future.
